name: Goodbye, Emilia.
description:
"Hey, Emilia? Can I tell you a story?"

A short tale about a brother and a sister in a world of despair.

Features:
- 6 endings
- Full voice-over
- < 1K words
- 1 sprite with multiple expressions
- 1 BG
- 1 music track
- No saving or loading.

All assets and code produced by Kowara, a member of Abyss Team.

Made for the O2A2 Jam.
